EmailTemplate.description: Industry & Regulatory Update Series Boston Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.name: Industry & Regulatory Updates Boston Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: ASA Industry and Regulatory Update – Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This is a friendly reminder of your registration for ASA’s upcoming Industry and Regulatory Update with Paul Combe, President and CEO, and Betsy Mayotte, Director of Regulatory Compliance and Privacy.
Wednesday, April 30, 2008 8:30 am – 12:00 pm (Continental breakfast will be provided.) American Student Assistance Directions - (All visitors must present a photo ID to access the building)
We encourage you to submit any relevant questions you would like Paul or Betsy to discuss at this session. To do so, please email your questions to training@amsa.com.
Canceling Your Registration If you need to cancel or change your training registration please email training@amsa.com or call the Training Department at (800) 999-9080, ext. 3099.
Other Information All of ASA's training programs are offered free of charge. Please contact us at training@amsa.com or (800) 999-9080, ext. 3099 with any questions about our training program.
We look forward to seeing you!
